author: pdobacz
content:
A new EOF EEST tests release is out https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/eip7692%40v2.1.0. Pls upgrade and report if stuff works (or PR directly to [the testing matrix](https://github.com/ipsilon/eof/blob/main/spec/implementation_matrix.md#testing-readiness-matrix)).

**NOTE**: There are now EOF blockchain_tests with coverage not included anywhere else, so be sure to run these too (they're just state tests wrapped in blockchain format for convenience - good portion of legacy EVM coverage from `ethereum/tests` ported over to EOF).
